targets.expr: avg(1 - (sum(rate(kirk_container_cpu_usage{podip=~"$podip", role=~"user|net"}[5m]) *  kirk_container_cpu_total{podip=~"$podip"} / rate(kirk_container_cpu_system{podip=~"$podip", role=~"user|net"}[5m])) by (podip)) / avg(kirk_container_cpu_quota{podip=~"$podip"}) by (podip))

min(1 - (sum(rate(kirk_container_cpu_usage{podip=~"$podip", role=~"user|net"}[5m]) *  kirk_container_cpu_total{podip=~"$podip"} / rate(kirk_container_cpu_system{podip=~"$podip", role=~"user|net"}[5m])) by (podip)) / avg(kirk_container_cpu_quota{podip=~"$podip"}) by (podip))

bottomk(5, 1 - (sum(rate(kirk_container_cpu_usage{podip=~"$podip", role=~"user|net"}[5m]) *  kirk_container_cpu_total{podip=~"$podip"} / rate(kirk_container_cpu_system{podip=~"$podip", role=~"user|net"}[5m])) by (podip)) / avg(kirk_container_cpu_quota{podip=~"$podip"}) by (podip))
